name: Leverage Deadlift
description: Machine-based deadlift using leverage system, targeting posterior chain with controlled movement pattern.
instructions: Load the pins to an appropriate weight. Position yourself directly between the handles. Grasp the bottom handles with a comfortable grip, and then lower your hips as you take a breath. Look forward with your head and keep your chest up. This will be your starting position.
Drive through your heels and extend your hips and knees to lift the weight upward. Keep your back straight and chest up throughout the movement. Exhale as you reach the top position.
Lower the weight back to the starting position by bending at the hips and knees in a controlled manner. Inhale as you return to the starting position.
